item.title: Bank of America, JPMorgan Chase to contribute $1,000 to Trump Accounts
item.description: Two of the biggest U.S. banks said they would match a $1,000 federal contribution for employees who open a Trump Account, touting the plan as a way to...

item.title: Fed holds interest rates steady in first meeting of 2026
item.description: The Federal Open Market Committee kept the federal funds rate steady, following three rate cuts last year.

item.title: Would-be assassin of Iranian dissident sentenced to 15 years in prison
item.description: Carlisle Rivera, who prosecutors say was hired as part of a murder-for-hire plot to assassinate Iranian dissident Masih Alinejad, was sentenced to 15 ...

item.title: FBI executing search order at Fulton County elections hub
item.description: FBI agents are executing a search at a warehouse that serves as Fulton County's election hub.

item.title: Bessent defends Powell probe:"Independence does not mean no accountability"
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent tells CBS News that Federal Reserve officials must be "beyond reproach" in communicating with the public.
